response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. I look forward to discussing the details with you further.", "product_price": 950000}
